# loadImage(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Asynchronously load the image. Error will be nil on success.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadImage(completionHandler: @escaping (UIImage?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
var image: UIImage? { get async throws }
```

```swift
func loadImage(completionHandler: @escaping (NSImage?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
var image: NSImage? { get async throws }
```

## Getting the display properties and image

- **title**: A short title for the game activity.
- **details**: A more detailed description of the game activity.
- **defaultProperties**: Default properties defined by the developer for this type of game activity.
